CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 23 In this study , we synthesized a new donor - acceptor type ( D- A type ) polymer , poly[quinacridone-alt-octyloxydithienylbenzothiadiazole] ( PQCDTB ) , which contained QC and octyloxydithienylbenzothiadiazole ( DTB ).

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name" in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly[quinacridone-alt-octyloxydithienylbenzothiadiazole] (PQCDTB) |
| quinacridone |
| octyloxydithienylbenzothiadiazole (DTB) |

I removed "poly" from the list as it is not a material name, but rather a prefix indicating the material is a polymer.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 23 In this study , we synthesized a new donor - acceptor type ( D- A type ) polymer , poly[quinacridone-alt-octyloxydithienylbenzothiadiazole] ( PQCDTB ) , which contained QC and octyloxydithienylbenzothiadiazole ( DTB ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| quinacridone |
| octyloxydithienylbenzothiadiazole |
| QC |
| DTB |

Note: "QC" and "DTB" are abbreviations for "quinacridone" and "octyloxydithienylbenzothiadiazole", respectively. They are used as shorthand notations to refer to the full names of the compounds in the context of the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| quinacridone |
| octyloxydithienylbenzothiadiazole |

These are the two material properties mentioned in the paragraph. "QC" and "DTB" are not included in the table as they are abbreviations and not explicitly mentioned as material properties.
